rows.label: tlk45300021_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear a couple of Blades from those
no-good Core Crystal hunters showed
up right here in this city.

rows.label: tlk45300021_04_msg0002
rows.name:
And apparently Special Inquisitor
Meleph defeated one of them personally!

rows.label: tlk45300021_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Maybe now it'll be a bit safer to
transport Core Crystals?

rows.label: tlk45300021_04_msg0005
rows.name: My brother will be pretty relieved.
